Cards.name: Shanks
Cards.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −3 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): All of your {FILM} type Characters gain +2000 power during this turn.

Cards.name: Ain
Cards.effect: [On Play] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

Cards.name: Ann
Cards.effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

Cards.name: Uta
Cards.effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)<br

Cards.name: Carina
Cards.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest this Character and trash 1 {FILM} type card from your hand: If your opponent has more DON!! cards on their field than you, add 2 DON!! cards from your DON!! deck and rest them.

Cards.name: Gild Tesoro
Cards.effect: [When Attacking] DON!! −2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Draw 2 cards.

Cards.name: Shiki
Cards.effect: If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle.

Cards.name: Zephyr
Cards.effect: When this Character battles ＜Strike＞ attribute Characters, this Character gains +3000 power during this turn.<br

Cards.name: Douglas Bullet
Cards.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −4 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Rest up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. Then, this Character gains [Double Attack] during this turn.<br

Cards.name: Buena Festa
Cards.effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {FILM} type card other than [Buena Festa] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

Cards.name: Lion's Threat Imperial Earth Bind
Cards.effect: [Main] DON!! −2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

Cards.name: Union Armada
Cards.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your {FILM} type Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. If that card is a Character, that Character cannot be K.O.'d during this turn.
